column4: when i compile a program on amd64, for some reason __x86_64__ isn't defined so i get the wrong __WORDSIZE defined... how can i fix this
hm i just noticed m32 was on the command line
thanks, looks like the makefile i was using was setting -m32. i fixed the makefile. thanks again for the help
yeah np -- it addumed you were on 32-bits
